pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(e)Plains$(). $(e)Plains$() in $(6)Village Mania().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1-3 $(item)Raw Beef$(), 1-3 $(item)Cooked Beef$() if killed with fire, 0-2 $(item)Leather$(), 2-4 $(item)Apple$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Apple Cow is an accidental mutation after some cows tried changing their diet from wheat to apples. Unfortunately, they would turn into apple cows. They wander across the plains of the world and do not harm anyone.
